title: Anyone selling a rarer backed T206 Cobb Red?
author: David R

posts.post_title: Anyone selling a rarer backed T206 Cobb Red?
posts.post_content:
I'd be interested in seeing what's out there is anyone has one for sale. Thanks.

David R

Wasn't particularly planning to sell .... but feel free to shoot me an offer on a Cobb Red Piedmont 42 (psa4) if that sort of thing turns ya on.  Oh and good luck to you .... that's a great card to shoot for a back set with!

Regards,
[url]scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url]
Forum user JohnnyHarmonica has a beautiful Cobb red portrait with a Sovereign back, that is priced low.

Still looking for one if anyone has one for sale or trade.  Thanks

David R
